name: Pixy - Coloring by Numbers
description:
Pixy is an easy-to-use coloring book suitable for both adults and kids. Adults will find it captivating enough to distract them from every-day stress while children will get the excitement of creating a truly wonderful digital masterpiece.

With Pixy it is very easy to create great-looking pictures – you just need to follow the number cues on the screen to determine which color you need to use. But let this simplicity not discourage you – numerous pictures are sure to engage you for a long time.

Main features:
• Easy to use – numbers in the boxes correspond to the colors in the palette
• Relaxing – slow-paced coloring is a good way reduce stress, and coloring cues get rid of the urge to find just the right color
• Suitable for all ages – the app suits both adults and children
• Educational – the app helps children develop fine motor skills while facilitating number and color recognition
